trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Dá suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> class provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> classe fornecer a seguinte funcionalidade:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> propriedade retorna uma coleção de esquemas para exibição de formatação de **AutoFormatação** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> propriedade retorna uma coleção de grupos de modelo para os modelos de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade sempre retorna `true`, indicando que o designer cria uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> class methods provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> métodos da classe fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método retorna a marcação que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the data source for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> método é chamado quando o esquema da fonte de dados associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> alterações.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como estender o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência dos controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example derives the `MyFormView` control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo deriva o `MyFormView` controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The `MyFormView` is simply a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.
trans-unit.target: O `MyFormView` é simplesmente uma cópia de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.

trans-unit.source: The example also derives the `MyFormViewDesigner` class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> and places a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> object for the `MyFormViewDesigner` on the `MyFormView` control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também deriva o `MyFormViewDesigner` classe o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> e coloca um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> de objeto para o `MyFormViewDesigner` no `MyFormView` controle.

trans-unit.source: The `MyFormViewDesigner` overrides the following items:
trans-unit.target: O `MyFormViewDesigner` substitui os seguintes itens:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> property to specify that the pager row for the design-time view of the `MyFormView` contain four page links.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> propriedade para especificar que o pager linha para o modo de exibição de tempo de design a `MyFormView` contém quatro links de página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A> property, if it is specified, as a new first row in the `MyFormView` grid at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para incluir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A> propriedade, se for especificado, como uma nova linha primeiro no `MyFormView` grade em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property of the `MyFormView` is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> propriedade o `MyFormView` é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> valor, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> desenha uma borda tracejada azul ao redor do controle para tornar sua extensão mais visível.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção da lista de ação de designer para esse designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of automatic formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de esquemas de formatação automáticos a serem exibidos na caixa de diálogo **Autoformatação**.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> that contains the predefined schemes for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> que contém os esquemas predefinidos para a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> objeto é preenchido com um membro codificados em XML de uma classe interna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the markup used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém a marcação usada para renderizar o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If an item template has been defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> collection of the control to an empty <xref:System.String> array if the schema for the data source cannot be obtained.
trans-unit.target: Se um modelo de item tiver sido definido para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> coleção do controle para vazio <xref:System.String> matriz se o esquema da fonte de dados não pode ser obtido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> refreshes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object to force a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> atualiza o <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> objeto para forçar uma chamada para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> then calls the base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> , em seguida, chama o método base para gerar a marcação.

trans-unit.source: If no item template has been defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to generate markup that renders to a placeholder.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum modelo de item tiver sido definido para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para gerar a marcação que renderiza a um espaço reservado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> class to change the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método em uma classe herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A> property, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A> is defined.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo adiciona uma nova linha primeiro à grade para conter o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A> propriedade, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Caption%2A> está definido.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property of the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> propriedade do controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> valor, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> desenha uma borda tracejada azul ao redor do controle para tornar sua extensão mais visível.

trans-unit.source: The example does not change the run-time appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo não altera a aparência de tempo de execução do controle.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control or a copy of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> método, certifique-se de chamar o método base porque ela eventualmente, por meio de vários níveis de substituição, chama o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> controle ou uma cópia do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> controle para gerar a marcação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup text that is used to render a placeholder for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto de marcação usado para renderizar um espaço reservado para o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o texto de marcação renderizado em um espaço reservado na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: If the markup for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control does not include one of the item templates, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method, which generates the markup for a placeholder that contains instructions on how to edit template content and a message that an item template is required.
trans-unit.target: Se a marcação para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle não tem um dos modelos de item, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> chamadas de método de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> método, que gera a marcação para um espaço reservado que contém instruções sobre como editar o conteúdo do modelo e uma mensagem de que um modelo de item é necessário.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />, which implements an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />, que implementa um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e projetar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> método quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> e seus métodos base configurem propriedades e conecte-se para eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle associado este designer ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o esquema da fonte de dados do controle associado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: A menos que o designer estiver no modo ou um campo de edição de modelo está sendo adicionado ou editado, a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> chamadas de método de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> método, que por sua vez chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> para atualizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle para refletir a alteração da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The properties for the class of the component.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe do componente.

trans-unit.source: Adds or removes properties in the properties grid in a design host at design time, or provides new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona ou remove propriedades na grade de propriedades em um host de design em tempo de design ou fornece novas propriedades de tempo de design que podem corresponder às propriedades no controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner" /> control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner" /> usa um contêiner de tabela externa para aplicar regras de estilo CSS embutidas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o controle usa um contêiner de tabela externa para aplicar regras de estilo CSS embutida; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> controle usa um contêiner de tabela externa para aplicar a regra de estilo embutido na marcação.

trans-unit.source: You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Você pode remover o contêiner de tabela externa definindo essa propriedade como `true`.

trans-unit.source: This provides flexibility in applying CSS style rules in the control markup.
trans-unit.target: Isso proporciona flexibilidade na aplicação de regras de estilo CSS na marcação do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de linhas de amostra a serem exibidas pelo controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The number of sample rows.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas de amostra.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> always returns `2`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> sempre retorna `2`.

trans-unit.source: This causes two page links to be displayed in the pager row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control at design time, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerSettings%2A> mode is numeric.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que dois links de página a ser exibida na linha do pager a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controlar em tempo de design, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerSettings%2A> modo é numérico.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> property in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> class to change the number of page links appearing in the pager row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> propriedade em uma classe herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> classe para alterar o número de links da página que aparece na linha do pager a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example causes four page links to display.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo faz com que os quatro links da página exibir.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de grupos de modelos para os campos do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" /> containing an element for each templated field in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" /> que contém um elemento para cada campo modelo de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property constructs a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> objects, one for each control template in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> propriedade constrói uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> objetos, um para cada modelo de controle associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The control templates are the header, footer, pager, item, edit item, insert item, and empty data.
trans-unit.target: Os modelos de controle são o cabeçalho, rodapé, pager, item, editar item, item de inserção e dados vazios.

trans-unit.source: The control template <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elements contain a single <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de controle <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elementos contêm uma única <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez do controle real que está associado ao designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is always true, the designer uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that contains a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade é sempre true, o designer usa um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle que contém uma cópia do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle não afeta qualquer persistência para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> itself to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade foi substituída para retornar `false`, o designer usará associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property to return <see langword="false" /> or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> propriedade para retornar <see langword="false" /> ou para determinar seu valor com base em se o controle está marcado com um nível de classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> is not overridden, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control ignores the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Se o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> não for substituído, o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> controle ignorará o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.
